item.description:
9:00PM
Blarney Stone, 1509 Dorchester Ave, Dorchester, MA 02122
Red Line T - Fields Corner Stop (Ashmont Line)

Here's your chance to explore Dorchester - Haven't you ever wondered what's at the other end of the Red Line? Hop on an Ashmont train and come on down. Dorchester is now one of Boston's most diverse neighborhoods and called home by Mark Wahlberg and 3 of 5 NKOTB!

Schedule
9:00pm Blarney Stone
10:00 dbar
10:45 Venice Pizza
11:00 Harp & Bard
12:00 Banshee

Pub Crawl Details: http://www.facebook.c...
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at Blarney Stone, 1509 Dorchester Ave, Dorchester at 9pm
item.name: Dot Ave Pub Crawl
